pr_title: Migrate server mapper tests to new MapperTestCase

timeline.message:
Migrate server mapper tests to new MapperTestCase

This continues #61301, migrating all of the mappers in `server` to the
new `MapperTestCase` which is nicer than `FieldMapperTestCase` because
it doesn't depend on all of Elasticsearch.

timeline.bodyText: Huh, I wonder why this doesn't support meta?
timeline.author: romseygeek
